#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int a[500001];
	bool b[500001];
	for(int i=1;i<=500000;i++){
		a[i] = 1;
		b[i] = false;
	}
	for(int j=2;j<=500000;j++){
		for(int k=j*2;k<=500000;k+=j){
			if(j>=10000){
				b[k] = true;
			}
			a[k] = a[k]*(j%10000);
			if(a[k]>=10000){
				a[k]%=10000;
				b[k] = true;
			}
		}
	}
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(b[n]){
			printf("%04d\n",a[n]);
		}else{
			printf("%d\n",a[n]);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
